letter
Class LetterFactory

java.lang.Object
  letter.LetterFactory

public class LetterFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton class which makes Constant and Variable objects.

Method Summary

Method Detail

instance

public static LetterFactory instance()
Gets singleton LetterFactory instance.

Returns:
the unique LetterFactory in existence.

parse

public java.util.LinkedList parse(java.lang.String s)
Parses a String into a LinkedList of Letter objects. The invariant being that parse(s) returns a list of Letter objects such that the concatenation of the return values of toString() on these Letter objects, would once again yield s.

Parameters:
s - the String.
Returns:
a LinkedList of Letter objects.

a new Constant object.
